meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mary Ciconte Scott Lord Jennifer Morrow Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7116.

td.p: Mary Ciconte, an executive administrator from Lombard, Illinois
Scott Lord, a construction attorney from Santa Monica, California
Jennifer Morrow, an editorial assistant from New York, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $37,000)

tr.td: 4-SYLLABLE WORDS
AMERICAN LIT
SPORTS & SONG
"R"IVERS
YOUR NUMBER IS UP
HELP ME, DR. SPOCK!
(Alex: Quotes from Baby and Child Care by the celebrated doctor.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'It\'s a shape-shifting optical instrument with bits of glass at the end of a rotating tube')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: It's a shape-shifting optical instrument with bits of glass at the end of a rotating tube

toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '(Mary: What is "Casey at the Bat"?)

JenniferMary
')

Scott
